Futurehome influxdb
query:
SELECT INTEGRAL("mean")/3600000 FROM ( SELECT MEAN("val") AS mean 
FROM "mqtt_consumer" WHERE ("topic" = 'pt:j1/mt:evt/rt:dev/rn:zigbee/ad:1/sv:meter_elec/ad:1_1')  AND unit = 'W'
AND time > now() - 1h GROUP BY time(10s) fill(previous) ) GROUP BY time(1h) tz('Europe/Oslo')
